summary: I HAVE A 2009 DODGE JOURNEY THAT PERIODICALLY WILL NOT START.  ALTERNATOR, STARTER, AND BATTERY ALL FINE. I HAVE BEEN READING THAT IT MAY BE A PROBLEM WITH THE NEUTRAL SAFETY SWITCH AND I AM APPARENTLY NOT THE ONLY PERSON THIS IS HAPPENING TOO. THIS LEFT ME STRANDED ON 7/1/17 AND 7/3/17.  PLEASE ADDRESS THIS ISSUE!
